title: Almond and fig tart
ingredients: ['Shortcrust pastry', '100g plain flour', '25g icing sugar', '55g butter', '1 to 3 tablespoons chilled water', 'Filling', '200g butter', '200g sugar (golden preferably)', '200g ground almonds', '1 orange, zested', '2 egg yolks', '1 tablespoon honey', '1/2 jar preserved figs, or 4 to 6 fresh']
